event.title: had established a store on the trail from Corsicana to Franklin by 1848

data.event: Asa Chambers had established a store on the trail from Corsicana to Franklin by 1848, when a post office, named Richland Crossing after nearby Richland Creek, opened in his store.

event.title: was built through the area in 1871

data.event: When the Houston and Texas Central Railway was built through the area in 1871, the station on the Pisgah Ridge near the store was designated Richland, and a new community began to develop around the depot.

event.title: the time of the Civil War, and by 1906

data.event: The first school had begun operating around the time of the Civil War, and by 1906 the town had a two-teacher school with an enrollment of seventy-five.
During the 1930s its population began to decline, in part because of the Great Depression.
The decline continued during the 1960s and 1970s, and by 1990 Richland had 244 residents and one business.
